author: Staff Reporter
text:
Coimbatore Corporation will on January 17 (Sunday) conduct pulse polio campaign across the city to administer oral polio vaccine, says a release from the civic body. From 7 a.m. to 5 p.m. on the day, the civic body will hold the drive at its establishments and main office, bus stands and railway stations.

In association with private health establishments, it will conduct the drive at hospitals and clinics as well. It will also press into service five vehicles to administer the drops to infants and children on the move.

The objective is to administer the drops to newborn and children less than five years of age and make the city polio-free. The release appeals to parents to take their children to the places where the oral polio vaccines are administered as they are completely safe. The parents may take their children even if the latter have been ill for one reason or other.
title: Pulse polio campaign on January 17
